Notes:

    If you don’t know HTML (coming up in a later lecture) you can use this as a sample index.htm to upload. Use a simple editor like Notepad to create the file. You should be able to cut and paste it right in to notepad.
    <title>This is Jane Spartan’s Home Page</title>
    <h1>A Very Simple Home Page</h1>
    <p>
    Welcome to my home page. This page
    is just a test to see if I can actually get something to upload.
    If you don’t like this page, it is the fault of my instructor in
    <a href=“http://www.vu.msu.edu/preview/cps291/”>
    CPS291.
    </a>
    </p>
